name: Omar Faruque Swapon
headline: With a passion for building solutions that enhance human efficiency and productivity

shortbio: I'm Omar Faruque Swapon, an Embedded Software Engineer with experience in 4G/5G LTE networks and the Internet of Things (IoT). I'm skilled in a variety of programming languages and technologies, including C/C++, Python, Golang, JavaScript, ReactJS, PostgreSQL, Docker, Linux and microcontroller programming.
I'm working on establishing 4G/5G LTE networks and developing software solutions for IoT projects. I'm fascinated by the potential of IoT to transform the way we live and work.

Looking ahead, I'm excited about the possibilities that lie ahead in the field of Industry 4.0. This new era of manufacturing relies on connected devices and advanced data analytics to drive efficiency and productivity, and I believe that my skills and experience in software development and IoT will be invaluable in this area.

On this website, you'll find information about my background, skills, and interests, as well as updates on my latest projects and achievements. I'm always looking for new opportunities to learn and grow, so please feel free to reach out if you have any questions or if you'd like to collaborate on a project. Thank you for visiting, and I look forward to connecting with you!
